Text: KAF storage project Cc As requested this is the summary of what we have discussed regarding KAF deal Scenario HPL nominates MMBTUDay Apr May MMBTU total of their south Texas production into the Kathleen Anne Field in Wilson County TX And Enron replaces this same volume in the location of their choice Scenario Scenario plus ENA sells HPL MMBTU of storage service with an injection rate of approximately MMBTUDay and a withdraw rate of MMBTUDay to help them serve the swing on the Tuffco contract Notes The field is not yet connected to HPL but will be Thanks for your help George Huan Gas Structuring

RE Good bye from George HuanPST Thanks John You still owe me the list of books that you thought I should read George Original Message From Griffith John Sent Friday December AM To Huan George Subject RE Good bye from George Huan I will keep in touch I have a few contacts in the industry and I will check them out It was great knowing you George Take care and keep in touch John Griffith I dont have email at home but my address is A Fairview Houston TX Original Message From Huan George Sent Friday December AM To May Larry Zipper Andy Griffith John Maggi Mike Subject Good bye from George Huan I had a great time working with the best option trading team in the energy industry What I have learned from you will benefit me a lot in my future career I will start looking for a new job If your friends in other trading house are looking for a junior trader please let me know Deep in my heart I want to be part of your team Count me in when the new company starts hiring people Sincerely George Huan Associate Trading Track Enron North America Till pm today My contact info H O

RE Indices in Test Cc Dawn Enclosed is a table with Spot Reference and firm refderence for tghose locations Give me a call if you have any other questions Thanks you very much Have a great day George Huan Spot Reference Firm Reference OptionGDD Chi NGI Chi NGICHI GATE GDPCHI GATE OptionGDD HSC IF HSC IFHPLSHPCHAN GDPHPLSHPCH OptionGDD Kern Opal IF NWPL RkyMtn IFNWPLROCKYM GDPKERNOPAL OptionGDD PEPL IF PEPL IFPANTXOK GDPPANTXOK OptionGDD Perm IF Perm IFELPOPERMIAN GDPELPOPERM OptionGDD TCO IF TCO IFCGTAPPALAC GDPCGTAPPALAC OptionGDD EP SJ IF EP SJ IFELPOSJ GDPELPOSANJUA Original Message From Kenne Dawn Sent Monday April PM To Huan George McLaughlin Errol Gossett Jeffrey Cc Sweitzer Tara Meredith Kevin Subject Indices in Test I need to get the indexes for new options as soon as possible Please let me know if you need more information Thanks Dawn Forwarded by Dawn C KenneHOUECT on PM Dawn C Kenne PM To George nronXGate Errol NRON cc Tara CT Kevin NRON Subject Indices in Test Larry May has requested the indexes listed below to be added to EOL for his options Can you please provide the indexes that need to be mapped in tagg for them to bridge correctly ie the spot and firm reference Thanks for your help Dawn Forwarded by Dawn C KenneHOUECT on PM Enron North America Corp From Kevin Meredith ENRON PM To Dawn C CT Tara CT cc Subject Indices in Test Here are the new indices for Larry Mays floating strike options that I have built in test OptionGDD Chi NGI Chi OptionGDD HSC IF HSC OptionGDD Kern Opal IF NWPL RkyMtn OptionGDD PEPL IF PEPL OptionGDD Perm IF Perm OptionGDD TCO IF TCO OptionGDD EP SJ IF EP SJ Let me know what else you may need Thanks Kevin
